name: node-judge-example
description: Mini online judge for Node.js tasks (stdin/stdout, time & memory)

scripts.start: npm run test:io && concurrently "npm run server" "npm run client"
scripts.test:all: npm run test:io && npm run test:health && npm run test
scripts.dev: npm run test:io && concurrently "npm run server" "npm run client"
scripts.dev:watch: concurrently "nodemon server.js" "npm run client" "npm run test:watch"
